channel.title: Steam is having trouble connecting to the steam servers
channel.description: Today, i was trying to connect steam to my account on my new pc. When i type in my password and hit enter, i get a box that says "having trouble connecting to the steam servers". I've tried editing the blob file twice. The first time, it displayed a window saying a purchase was being processed. The second time, it repeated the connection error. How can i fix it? EDIT: It's saying that my password is wrong now. I'm going through the correct steps, however, when i get the email, my account question is not what i set it to be. Instead, it says "What did customer support last reset your passphrase to?"

item.title: Steam is having trouble connecting to the steam servers
item.dc:creator: SwampFox
item.description:
Calebmcghee:

Disregard this. Being a jackass, i forgot a single letter in my password

I love how you copied SwampFox’56 signature. I would have thought you could have been a little original

Read full topic

item.title: Steam is having trouble connecting to the steam servers
item.dc:creator: Calebmcghee
item.description:
Today, i was trying to connect steam to my account on my new pc. When i type in my password and hit enter, i get a box that says “having trouble connecting to the steam servers”. I’ve tried editing the blob file twice. The first time, it displayed a window saying a purchase was being processed. The second time, it repeated the connection error. How can i fix it?
EDIT: It’s saying that my password is wrong now. I’m going through the correct steps, however, when i get the email, my account question is not what i set it to be. Instead, it says “What did customer support last reset your passphrase to?”

Read full topic
item.source: Steam is having trouble connecting to the steam servers
